name: Genetic Singularity
description:
Evolution does not happen overnight – Until now.

  • Use [WASD] keys to move
  • Use the mouse cursor to aim
  • [Right Click] to shoot
  • [Left Click] to dash

Collect evolution points to evolve. The evolution you will get is random, and it is up to you to find out what changed. Do you have what it takes to reach genetic singularity by dawn?

Music made by Prod. Riddiman on YouTube - R!DD!MAN - DR!FT! / DRIFT PHONK TYPE BEAT [FREE FOR PROFIT USE]
